name: Piratera
description: Piratera is an adventure game with attractive gameplay, fascinating storyline and unique game art; in which players are able to earn tokens by joining in-game battles or contributing to the ecosystem. Getting in Piratera world, players will assume Pirate Captain roles of exploring the sea, broadening new horizons and conquering massive treasures. Players are also able to communicate, engage in combats, carry on trades and be shoulder-to-shoulder together on every quest.
